title: Back to Back Stemplots: Fantasy Defense
question_text:
The following back to back stem and leaf plot represents the amount of fantasy football points scored by two teams, the Defenders and the PointMisers.
Which of the following statements is true?

Key: 10|0=10.0

choices.text: Defenders have a greater mean and PointMisers have a greater mode.
Defenders have a greater mode and PointMisers have a greater median.
Defenders have a greater mode and Defenders have a greater mean.
Defenders have a greater median and PointMisers have a greater mode.
Defenders have a greater mean and there is no mode for PointMisers.

solution:
The mode is the most common value in the dataset.

For the Defenders, the most common value is $5.5$. The stem is $5$ and the leaf of $5$ appears three times. These each represent $5.5$ fantasy points for the week.

For the PointMisers, the mode is actually $0$ points, which appears three times.

The median is the middle number if the dataset has an odd amount of elements, and is the average of the two middle numbers if the dataset has an even number of elements.

With $16$ games played, we take the average of the $8\text{th}$ and $9\text{th}$ numbers. For the Defenders, the $8\text{th}$ value is $5.5$ and the $9\text{th}$ value is $6.0$, so the median is $5.75$. For the PointMisers, the $8\text{th}$ value is $6.5$ and the $9\text{th}$ value is $6.8$, so the median is $6.65$. Therefore, The Defenders have a higher mode and the PointMisers have a higher median.

Explanation of Distractors

Choice ‘A’ is incorrect because the Defenders have a greater mode ($5.5$ versus $0$).

Choice ‘C’ is incorrect because the PointMisers have a greater mean than the Defenders ($6.475$ versus $6.45$).

Choice ‘D’ is incorrect because the Defenders have a greater mode ($5.5$ versus $0$).

Choice ‘E’ both because the PointMisers have a greater mean than the Defenders ($6.475$ versus $6.45$), and the PointMisers do have a mode ($0$).
